name: YMCA of San Francisco - Bayview Hunters Point
description: The Bayview Hunters Point branch of the YMCA of San Francisco offers wellness and learning for all, from infants to seniors through a wide variety of programs, events, and activities at their facility, which includes a fitness room, gymnasium, cycling studio, and a conference room. Sliding Scale Pricing is available based on income and household size. All inquiries into financial assistance and supporting documentation are confidential. Learn more about the financial assistance program: https://
